CTRL-labs | many positions | NYC

Imagine the world where computers are natural extensions of thought and movement.

CTRL-labs dedicates itself to answering the biggest questions in computing, neuroscience, and design so creators can dream.

Our work to build a transformative neural interface spans research and challenges at the intersection of computational neuroscience, statistics, machine learning, biophysics, hardware, and human-computer interaction.
